LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Pipe.label: Solar Pipe
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Pipe.description: Tobacco made by drying helianto flowers. When smoking, it quickly replenishes yang and makes you feel better.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea.label: Solar Tea
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea.description: Tea made from the helianto flower petals. It is fragrant and warm, so drinking it can make you a little tired.
